This is my JSC370 Final Project website.

```{r include = FALSE}
source("process_starbucks_data.R")
p1 <- ggplot(sb_locs_state, aes(x = population, y = n_stores, color = state)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.8)
p2 <- ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(data = subset(sb_nutr, Category == "Food"), aes(x = Calories), binwidth = 50, fill = "blue", alpha = .2) +
  geom_histogram(data = subset(sb_nutr, Category == "Drinks"), aes(x = Calories), binwidth = 50, fill = "red", alpha = .2) +
  labs(title = "Calories of Starbucks Food/Drinks",
       x = "Calories", y = "Frequency")
```
